metatags.og:description: Municipal Reference center The Municipal Reference Center (MRC) houses publications issued by and for the City and County of Honolulu agencies. The MRC des not sell copies of publications. The Municipal Reference Center is currently scanning its collection and making publications available to the public via the City and County of Honolulu’s DocuShare database. Information […]

metatags.og:image:alt:
Part IV : Stolen Pokémon Collection 

Just uploading photos of the cards that are still out there that was stolen from the trunk of the car after card show this past Friday. 

*just spreading some awareness through the community to just be wary if you ever come across these cards. I’m really hoping that these perpetrators have a change of heart and to just return the cards to the rightful owner without having the authority involved but if given no choice then I’ll keep in place the police report and pursuit other avenues of approach in order to seek proper justice by the law. 

I appreciate everyone who’s reached out for support and gave info on the kind of people who we are dealing it. I’m also doing my best to be as transparent, and compassionate to everyone in here. So If you’re one of them that has these cards. Just please reach out to me and resolve this Issue as civil as possible. These properties will have no value to you if you tried to take to any card shops, trust me on that because the w

Part IV : Stolen Pokémon Collection 

Just uploading photos of the cards that are still out there that was stolen from the trunk of the car after card show this past Friday. 

*just spreading some awareness through the community to just be wary if you ever come across these cards. I’m really hoping that these perpetrators have a change of heart and to just return the cards to the rightful owner without having the authority involved but if given no choice then I’ll keep in place the police report and pursuit other avenues of approach in order to seek proper justice by the law. 

I appreciate everyone who’s reached out for support and gave info on the kind of people who we are dealing it. I’m also doing my best to be as transparent, and compassionate to everyone in here.
